column5: thought you carp guys would like to see this beast of a carp caught by an angler i know...
WOW !!!  My arm aches just thinking about catching it...
holy cow that is a beast!! I can only keep dreaming   ...

I can't believe he released it.  Think of the nice grain fed steaks you could get off of that beast  Without weighing them I'm pretty sure I have been lucky enough to get some over 30...but a 40 ...WOW that would be fun.
I haven't got a 40 yet...  36lb 12oz And 36lb 8oz  Are my biggest so far...
I don't know.  I don't believe it's an ounce over 39.75-lbs.
What a beast! Healthy looking fish, looks like he's been actively gorging
A new Ontario record that is!  Existing record is 39.88 lbs  Nice!

Very nice fish. Paul definitely is doing great out there.   The record has been shattered a many times (unofficially of course). You'll be hard pressed to find dedicated carpers willing to kill a fish for the records.  A friend of mine landed a 56lber on the St. Lawrence which won him a weeks stay at a motel that caters to carpers.
What a pig of a fish that is The guy musta had serious cramps in his arms after that one
That's obscene...disgusting...disturbing and AWESOME!  Great fish your buddy got there Mike.  PM sent btw.

yeah...  the record is broken every year ron...  just carpers are very protective of their fish..  this is the second 40+lb fish between the group of guy i know that fish carp...  most years a fish pushing 50lbs gets caught in my area...
HOLY CARP!!!!  I'm still waiting to break 30!  What a magnificent fish... love the underwater release footage as well.
